name: Dinari BA
description: The Dinari BA dShares token (BA.d) represents 1:1 ownership of shares in The Boeing Company, a global leader in aerospace and defense. Each BA.d token is fully collateralized by a corresponding Boeing share held securely in a transparent and auditable treasury. By leveraging blockchain technology, BA.d provides investors with seamless access to Boeing stock, enabling 24/7 trading, fractional ownership, instant settlement, and enhanced liquidity. This tokenized asset offers a modern way to invest in a company that drives innovation in aviation, space exploration, and military technology.
